prompts.fbPrompt:
Instructions:
- Use the format below without adding, removing, or changing the order of sections, headings, or emojis.
- Each instruction step must begin with a number followed by a dash (e.g., 1-), and use clear, concise language. Do not include any empty lines between steps.
- Write only plain text (no markdown or special characters).
- Exclude any haram ingredients (pork, bacon, wine, etc.) and replace them silently with halal-friendly alternatives (e.g., pork ‚Üí beef/chicken, wine ‚Üí grape juice).
- Do not mention substitutions or the word "halal."
- Title must be short, engaging, SEO-friendly, and include relevant emojis.

Now generate a recipe for the dish called {{recipeIdea}} in {{language}}, using this exact template:

[Catchy, SEO-optimized recipe title with emojis in the end]

Ingredients üßÇ

- [Ingredient 1]
- [Ingredient 2]
- [Ingredient 3]
...

Preparation üßë‚Äçüç≥

1- [Step 1: Description]
2- [Step 2: Description]
3- [Step 3: Description]
...

Servings: [Number]
Prep Time: [Time]
Cook Time: [Time]
Total Time: [Total Time]

Enjoy your meal ‚ú®
#Recipe
prompts.mjTemplate: Realistic amateur photo from reddit taken with an iPhone 15 Pro Max. Recipe: {title}. ingredients: {ingredients}. A close-up shot of a white plate.
